vip.title: VIP Program
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_1: Earn free credits with every new level—more levels, more rewards!
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_2: Play your favorites, earn cash back. It's that simple!
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_3: Celebrate with us! Enjoy free credits on your birthday.
vip.INFO_DESCRIPTION_4: Celebrate each festival with a special mystery gift, just for you!
vip.QA_TITLE_1: How can I become a VIP member?
vip.QA_CONTENT_1: To qualify for lifetime Bronze Member status, you must accumulate deposits totaling at least SGD 30,000.
vip.QA_TITLE_2: How many levels are in the VIP program?
vip.QA_CONTENT_2: To upgrade your membership, you must meet the minimum deposit requirements for the next tier. For instance, upgrading from Bronze to Silver requires a total deposit of at least SGD 150,000, and moving from Silver to Rose Gold requires deposits totaling SGD 550,000.
vip.QA_TITLE_3: What is the validity of my VIP membership status?
vip.QA_CONTENT_3: Membership status for the Gold level and below is valid for a lifetime. Platinum and Diamond levels are valid for one month.
vip.QA_TITLE_4: How can I maintain my Platinum/Diamond membership status?
vip.QA_CONTENT_4: To retain your Platinum or Diamond status for the next month, you must deposit the specified amount by the end of the current month. For example, maintaining Platinum status requires a deposit of SGD 50,000 each month.
vip.QA_TITLE_5: Is there a fee to participate in the VIP program?
vip.QA_CONTENT_5: No, there are no annual or monthly fees. Our VIP program is designed to reward the loyalty of members who consistently engage with B9Casino since their registration date.

poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_1: Deposit a minimum of SGD100 (daily first deposit) to receive one (1) mini-game ticket.
poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_2: Accumulate SGD2,000 or more in deposits on the same day to receive an additional five (5) tickets (total of 6 tickets).
poker_king.Ticket_Redemption_3: Receive three (3) extra tickets for every 10th spin.
poker_king.Example_1: Participant A: Makes an initial deposit of SGD100 (1 ticket), then adds SGD1,900 the same day, totaling SGD2,000, earning an additional 5 tickets (6 tickets total).
poker_king.Example_2: Participant B: Deposits SGD2,000 in one transaction, instantly receiving 6 tickets.
poker_king.How_to_Play_1: Click "Draw" to draw your first card and determine your initial hand. Click here for tutorial how to play
poker_king.Important_Notes_1: Prizes will be credited within 60 seconds.
poker_king.Important_Notes_2: All prizes must meet a 1x turnover requirement before withdrawal.
poker_king.Important_Notes_3: Only one account per individual, family, household, email, phone number, bank account, or IP address is permitted.
poker_king.Important_Notes_4: B9Casino reserves the right to amend or terminate this promotion at any time.

help_center_page.description: Welcome to the B9Casino Help Center! Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions about your account, deposits, withdrawals, promotions, or games. Feel free to contact us via live chat—we're here to help!
help_center_page.Quick_Solutions_Description: Find instant answers to common questions in our FAQs.

help_center_page.need_more_help_description: Don’t hesitate — reach out through our 24/7 Live Chat. We’re here to ensure your experience is smooth and enjoyable.

tncs_page.title: General Terms & Conditions
tncs_page.Terms_Conditions_Apply_Description: By using B9Casino's services, you agree to these terms, which are effective upon your first use. If you disagree, please do not use our services. These terms may be updated, and continued use signifies acceptance.
tncs_page.General_Use_Description_1: Users must be of legal age (18+) and legally permitted to gamble online.
tncs_page.General_Use_Description_2: One account per user. Duplicate accounts will be terminated.
tncs_page.General_Use_Description_3: Provide accurate personal and payment details. Notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized account usage.
tncs_page.General_Use_Description_4: Users must ensure the confidentiality of account details. Notify customer service immediately if your login details are compromised.
tncs_page.General_Rules_Description_1: Bets placed must comply with posted game rules. Incorrect odds due to technical errors are voided.
tncs_page.General_Rules_Description_2: B9Casino reserves the right to refuse bets or close accounts for breaches or suspicious activities.
tncs_page.General_Rules_Description_3: All bets are final once confirmed. Results posted by B9Casino are binding and final.
tncs_page.Deposits_Withdrawals_Description_1: Funds must be wagered fully at least once before withdrawal.
tncs_page.Deposits_Withdrawals_Description_2: Deposits and withdrawals must use accounts matching your registered name.
tncs_page.Deposits_Withdrawals_Description_3: Withdrawal requests will process only if turnover requirements are fulfilled.
tncs_page.Bonuses_and_Promotions_Description_1: Bonuses must meet specified conditions before withdrawals.
tncs_page.Bonuses_and_Promotions_Description_2: Misuse or violation can lead to forfeiture of bonus and winnings.
tncs_page.Bonuses_and_Promotions_Description_3: Bonus terms can be changed or canceled anytime without notice.
tncs_page.Liability_Disclaimers_Description_1: Participation is at your own risk. B9Casino accepts no liability for losses or errors beyond our control.
tncs_page.Liability_Disclaimers_Description_2: We are not responsible for third-party information accuracy (scores, odds, etc.).
tncs_page.Liability_Disclaimers_Description_3: B9Casino isn't liable for interruptions, technical issues, or inaccuracies.
tncs_page.Account_Privacy_Description_1: Provide accurate personal information for verification and transactions.
tncs_page.Account_Privacy_Description_2: Accounts and transactions must match your registered details.
tncs_page.Legal_Compliance_Description_1: You must comply with applicable laws in your jurisdiction.
tncs_page.Legal_Compliance_Description_2: Residents of restricted regions (e.g., Hong Kong, the Netherlands, Philippines, Malaysia, Switzerland, Taiwan, Turkey, USA) are prohibited from using our services.
tncs_page.Intellectual_Property_Description: Site content and software remain intellectual property of B9Casino. Unauthorized use, copying, or distribution is prohibited.
tncs_page.Governing_Law_Description: These terms are governed by the laws of the Isle of Man, and you agree to the jurisdiction of its courts.
tncs_page.Miscellaneous_Description_1: These terms constitute the entire agreement between you and B9Casino. We may assign this agreement without notice. No third-party rights are created by this agreement.
tncs_page.Miscellaneous_Description_2: For detailed rules and regulations, refer to the specific game and betting rules available on our platform. B9Casino's decisions are final on all matters relating to these terms.

responsible_gaming_page.title: Responsible Gaming
responsible_gaming_page.Enjoy_Gambling_Responsibly_Description: At B9Casino, we encourage responsible gambling as a form of entertainment. Always gamble responsibly, do not chase losses, and never wager money you cannot afford to lose. Regularly monitor your account balance and manage your budget to prevent significant losses. If gambling causes discomfort or stress, please consider self-exclusion and stop playing immediately.
responsible_gaming_page.Enjoy_Gambling_Responsibly_Description_1: For assistance or concerns, contact our 24/7 customer support via live chat.
responsible_gaming_page.Responsible_Gaming_Measures_Description: B9Casino prioritizes player safety by ensuring fairness, transparency, and responsibility. We educate our players about the risks of gambling addiction. Regular and uncontrolled gambling can negatively impact your personal, social, and financial life. Early signs of addiction include neglecting personal responsibilities and using gambling as a coping mechanism.
responsible_gaming_page.Preventing_Gambling_Addiction_Descriptio: Recognize and reflect on your gambling habits. Seek immediate help if the following applies to you:
Gambling as an escape from boredom.
Losing interest in personal relationships and hobbies.
Chasing losses and urgently seeking to gamble again.
Criticism from others about your gambling behavior.
Lying about the time and money spent on gambling.
Borrowing money to settle gambling debts.
Gambling due to arguments, disappointment, or anger.
Feeling depressed or having suicidal thoughts related to gambling.
Seek professional help if you experience any of the above.
responsible_gaming_page.Preventing_Underage_Gambling_Description: B9Casino strictly prohibits gambling by individuals under 18 years old. Minors often lack the maturity to make rational gambling decisions. We advise parents to:
Use filtering software to restrict access on children's devices.
Monitor children's computer or device usage.
Educate children about gambling risks when appropriate.
Avoid saving passwords or login details on shared devices.
Keep credit cards and payment information inaccessible to minors.
Together, we can promote safe and responsible gambling.

privacy_policy_page.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy_page.title1_Description: At B9Casino, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy outlines how we collect, manage, and use your data securely and responsibly.
privacy_policy_page.Purpose_of_Collecting_Information_Descri: Your information allows B9Casino to manage your account, provide access to our products and games, enhance your user experience, and communicate important updates.
privacy_policy_page.Collection_of_Personal_Information_Descr: We collect your personal details with your consent when you register an account, use our services, or communicate with us. This information helps us deliver tailored services and improve user experience.
privacy_policy_page.Marketing_Communications_Description: With your prior consent, we may send you marketing communications about promotions and updates through your chosen methods (Email, SMS, Phone Calls, or Social Media). You can modify your communication preferences anytime through your account settings, customer service, or by email.
privacy_policy_page.Data_Sharing_Description: We do not share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes. However, we may share data with trusted third parties, such as gaming software providers, solely to deliver services or comply with legal obligations. You will always be informed before any such data transfer.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description: B9Casino strictly prohibits gambling by individuals under 18 years old. Minors often lack the maturity to make rational gambling decisions. We advise parents to:
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_1: Regularly update you on significant changes and improvements.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_2: Provide secure and reliable access to our services.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_3: Promptly address your inquiries and concerns.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_5: Keep accurate and updated user records.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_6: Investigate suspicious activities fairly and thoroughly.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_7: Ensure marketing practices align with your preferences.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_8: Continuously enhance system security and reliability.
privacy_policy_page.Our_Commitment_to_You_Description_9: Prevent unlawful activities and comply fully with legal regulations.
privacy_policy_page.Your_Rights_Description: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
privacy_policy_page.Your_Rights_Description_1: Access, update, or delete your personal information.
privacy_policy_page.Your_Rights_Description_4: Transfer your personal data to another service.
privacy_policy_page.Your_Rights_Description_5: Submit complaints to data protection authorities if concerned.
privacy_policy_page.Use_of_Cookies_Description: We use cookies to personalize your experience by remembering your preferred language, enhance account security, and analyze website traffic and marketing effectiveness.
privacy_policy_page.Use_of_Cookies_Description_1: Your continued use of our services signifies your consent to this privacy policy. If you have any questions or wish to exercise your rights, please contact our customer support.

kyc_page.title: KYC Policy
kyc_page.Introduction_Description: By accepting our Terms, you authorize B9Casino to conduct verification checks ("Checks") necessary to confirm your identity and contact details. Withdrawals may be restricted during this verification process. Providing incorrect, incomplete, or misleading information may lead to immediate account termination or suspension, particularly if age verification fails.
kyc_page.Underage_Gambling_Description: If you are found to be underage:
kyc_page.Underage_Gambling_Description_1: Your account will be immediately closed.
kyc_page.Underage_Gambling_Description_2: All transactions made will become void.
kyc_page.Underage_Gambling_Description_3: Deposited funds will be returned, while winnings accrued will be forfeited.
kyc_page.Underage_Gambling_Description_4: Any withdrawn funds must be returned to B9Casino.
kyc_page.Updating_Personal_Information_Descriptio: Please promptly notify our support team of any changes in your personal details.
kyc_page.KYC_Policy_Objectives_Description: B9Casino may request identity verification in cases of:
kyc_page.KYC_Policy_Objectives_Description_1: Suspected fraud, money laundering, or illegal activity.
kyc_page.KYC_Policy_Objectives_Description_2: Doubts regarding authenticity of submitted documents.
kyc_page.KYC_Policy_Objectives_Description_3: Breaches of our Terms of Service.
kyc_page.KYC_Policy_Objectives_Description_4: Any situation deemed necessary by B9Casino.
kyc_page.Additional_verification_Description_1: Secondary ID (driver's license, military ID, etc.)
kyc_page.Additional_verification_Description_2: Photo of user holding their open passport next to their face
kyc_page.Additional_verification_Description_3: Photo of the front side of a bank card (clearly showing first 5 and last 4 digits, cardholder's name, expiry date)
kyc_page.Source_Funds_Description: Documents accepted as proof of funds include:
kyc_page.Source_Funds_Description_1: Payslips, remuneration statements, dividends, or pension documents
kyc_page.Source_Funds_Description_2: Bank statements clearly showing consistent income
kyc_page.Source_Funds_Description_3: Trust deeds demonstrating entitlement Official proof of awards or payments received
kyc_page.Reasons_Document_Description_1: Address or name mismatches your registered details
kyc_page.Reasons_Document_Description_3: Provided documents are unacceptable (e.g., incorrect document type, mail envelopes instead of utility bills)
kyc_page.Reasons_Document_Description_4: Other reasons as determined by B9Casino
kyc_page.Due_Diligence_Description: All customers must undergo a due diligence (DD) process with proper record-keeping.
kyc_page.Anonymous_Accounts_Description: Anonymous or alias accounts are strictly prohibited. Accounts unable to verify identity will be closed, winnings voided, and deposits returned if feasible.
kyc_page.Duplicate_or_Multiple_Accounts_Descripti: Multiple accounts controlled by the same person are not allowed. B9Casino reserves the right to close additional accounts, void associated winnings, and return deposits. The company retains the exclusive right to reject applications or terminate services without providing specific reasons if KYC terms are breached.

B92U_Bank_page.What_Can_I_Do_With_B92U_Bank: What Can I Do With B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.What_Can_I_Do_With_B92U_Bank_desc: With B92U Bank, you can increase your earnings with a high 9% yearly interest on your withdrawals. It's simple: transfer your balance to B92U Bank and see your profits grow.
B92U_Bank_page.How_Do_I_View_My_B92U_Bank_Earnings: How Do I View My B92U Bank Earnings?
B92U_Bank_page.How_Do_I_View_My_B92U_Bank_Earnings_desc: Once you login to your B9Casino account, go to the B92U Bank section on the main menu dashboard. You'll find a simple summary of your B92U Bank account balance and the impressive 9% annual interest you've earned.
B92U_Bank_page.How_Do_I_Transfer_Cash_Into_B92U_Bank: How Do I Transfer Cash Into B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.Step_1_desc: Log in to your B9casino account and click "Withdrawal".
B92U_Bank_page.Step_2_desc: Choose Withdrawal with "B92U Bank" and select the amount from your Main Wallet.
B92U_Bank_page.Step_3_desc: Confirm, and your funds will move securely to B92U Bank, earning you 9% annual interest.
B92U_Bank_page.How_Do_I_Transfer_Cash_Out_of_B92U_Bank: How Do I Transfer Cash Out of B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.Step_1_1_desc: Log in to your B9casino account and go to "Deposit".
B92U_Bank_page.Step_1_2_desc: Log in to your B9casino account and go to "Deposit".
B92U_Bank_page.Step_1_3_desc: "Proceed & Confirm", your funds will easily return to your Main Wallet.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_1: What is the minimum transfer amount to B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_1_desc: The minimum transfer amount to B92U Bank is SGD50.00
B92U_Bank_page.faq_2: How is the interest calculated on my deposits?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_2_desc: Interest accrual for deposits into B92U Bank is calculated based on 00:00:00 to 23:59:59 daily. Please note that all withdrawals to B92U Bank will be subject to system approval, which may affect the timing of interest calculation. For instance, if a withdrawal is approved after 12am, the amount will not be counted for interest.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_3: When will I start earning interest on my deposits?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_3_desc: Interest on your deposits will start accruing from the day they are successfully transferred to B92U Bank.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_4: How often is the interest credited to my B92U Bank account?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_4_desc: The interest is credited daily, providing you with daily returns on your balance.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_5: Can I transfer funds back to my Main Wallet anytime?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_5_desc: Yes, you can transfer funds from B92U Bank back to your Main Wallet at any time.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_6: Are there any fees or charges for fund transfers?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_6_desc: We do not charge any fees for transferring funds between your Main Wallet and B92U Bank.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_7: Is my interest rate fixed at 9% p.a.?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_7_desc: Yes, the interest rate for B92U Bank is fixed at 9% per annum.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_8: Are there any turnover requirements when i use B92U Bank to do deposit?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_8_desc: Yes, there will be 1x turnover requirement for no bonus deposit. If member use B92U Bank to deposit & claimed bonus, the turnover requirement will be based on the respective bonus.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_9: Can I view my transaction history in B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_9_desc: Yes, you can view your transaction history, including deposits and withdrawals, within the B92U Bank section.
B92U_Bank_page.faq_10: Is my data and account information secure with B92U Bank? transaction history in B92U Bank?
B92U_Bank_page.faq_10_desc: Yes, we prioritize the security and privacy of your data. We use the latest encryption technology to ensure that your personal information and account details are kept safe and secure.

deposit_page.Important_Note_note_1: To deposit crypto, scan the QR code or copy the provided address.

deposit_page.Important_Note_note_5: Deposits sent to the wrong address or network cannot be recovered, and B9Casino is not responsible.
deposit_page.Important_Note_note_6: Credits will reflect in your wallet within 2-10 minutes after the transaction is confirmed.

faqs_page.title_1: How do I register at B9Casino?
faqs_page.content_1: Simply visit the B9Casino website, click Sign Up, and complete the registration form. Your account will be active immediately after verification.
faqs_page.title_2: What payment methods does B9Casino accept?
faqs_page.content_2: B9Casino accepts various methods including online banking, ATM transfers, e-wallets, payment gateways, and cryptocurrency deposits.
faqs_page.content_3: Log in to your B9Casino account, select the deposit option, choose your preferred method, enter the amount, and follow the instructions provided.

about_us_page.description1: B9Casino is a premier online gaming platform dedicated to providing high-quality casino entertainment in the Asia Pacific region. Our vision is simple: deliver exceptional gaming experiences and unbeatable value. At B9Casino, we offer industry-leading gaming products, outstanding promotions, and reliable customer support, ensuring an enjoyable and satisfying experience for every player.
about_us_page.description2: Our extensive gaming selection includes Baccarat, Roulette, SicBo, popular online slots, and progressive jackpots, all presented on an advanced platform with stunning graphics, immersive animations, customizable gameplay speeds, and dynamic sound effects. We aim to cater to diverse player preferences, providing endless opportunities for exciting wins.
about_us_page.description3: Our customer service team is available 24/7, dedicated to addressing your questions and resolving issues promptly, courteously, and effectively. At B9Casino, customer satisfaction is paramount, and we continually strive to exceed your expectations through exceptional service.
about_us_page.description4: To maintain fairness and system integrity, each player is permitted only one B9Casino account, subject to regular security checks. We employ cutting-edge software technology and rigorous security protocols to guarantee fair gameplay and safeguard your personal information, providing a secure and trustworthy gaming environment.
